name: Kapow!
description:
This is a game heavily inspired (read: a direct clone) by the old game "Kaboom" for the Atari 2600. 

Play by clicking and moving the mouse or taps and swipes. On computers, press ESC to free the mouse. I also recommend full screen mode.

Known issues: as always with phaser games, sound doesn't work in all mobile browsers. I tested it on an android tablet and two phones (sound works fine). I also tested on two iPads, and while the game works great, there's no sound.
